CONCEPT.TITLE: The concept
CONCEPT.TEXT: This website is under open-source license, the link to the GitHub repository is available below. The applications on this website are intended to meet various technical or non-technical needs, to demonstrate skills, and especially to save time.

DEVELOPER.TITLE: The developer
DEVELOPER.TEXT-PART-1: I am an information engineering student who enjoys web development as much as software development. I love starting new projects that are too ambitious for me to ever see through.
DEVELOPER.TEXT-PART-2: May this website not be one of them...

PIXELATOR.HINT: One pixel will be displayed every group of N * N pixels

COLOR-REDUCER.HINT: Reduces the number of colors to N colors

OUTLINE-ADDITION.HINT: Adds an outline around non-transparent colors
